processGroups.name: Create Client on Fineract via Http Post

labels.label:
Fetch Active Client from m_client and if there is need to fetch pending client,
Then Duplicate the these two processors and apply appropriate sql and Jolt Transform SetUp Then use a funnel to to send streams of flow file into OUTPUT Port

config.comments: { "firstname" : "Suzi", "middlename" : null, "lastname" : "Erdman", "mobileNo" : null, "externalId" : "89GIOUQN", "officeId" : 1, "legalFormId" : 1, "isStaff" : 0, "active" : 1, "dateFormat" : "dd MMMM yyyy", "locale" : "en", "activationDate" : "25 February 2022", "submittedOnDate" : "25 February 2022", "dateOfBirth" : "21 March 2004" }

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: select distinct (ac.accountid), case when ac.productid = 21054 then 5 when ac.productid = 21059 then 5 when ac.productid = 21065 then 5 when ac.productid = 21071 then 5 when ac.productid = 21072 then 5 when ac.productid = 21073 then 5 when ac.productid = 21074 then 5 when ac.productid = 21075 then 5 when ac.productid = 21076 then 5 end AS productId, FORMAT(l.ValueDate, 'dd MMMM yyyy') AS submittedOnDate, FORMAT(l.ValueDate, 'dd MMMM yyyy') AS expectedDisbursementDate, l.AccountID AS externalId, li.PrincipalBalance AS principal, l.Term AS loanTermFrequency, 2 AS loanTermFrequencyType, l.Term AS numberOfRepayments, case when l.RepaymentFrequencyID = 'D' then 0 when RepaymentFrequencyID = 'W' then 1 when RepaymentFrequencyID = 'M' then 2 when RepaymentFrequencyID = 'Y' then 3 end AS repaymentEvery, 2 AS repaymentFrequencyType, l.InterestRate/12 AS interestRatePerPeriod, 1 AS interestType, 'false' AS isEqualAmortization, 1 AS amortizationType, 1 AS interestCalculationPeriodType, 'false' AS allowPartialPeriodInterestCalcualtion, 5 AS transactionProcessingStrategyId, ? AS clientId, 'dd MMMM yyyy' AS dateFormat, 'en' AS locale, 'individual' AS loanType, l.LoanStatusID AS LoanStatus, l.ApplicationID AS ApplicationID, ac.ClientID AS brClientId from t_loan (nolock) l left join t_AccountCustomer (nolock) ac on l.accountid = ac.accountid join t_Product (nolock) p on ac.ProductID = p.ProductID join t_Collateral c (nolock) on c.OwnerClientID = ac.ClientID and c.OurBranchID = l.OurBranchID join t_CollateralVehicle (nolock) cv on cv.CollateralID = c.CollateralID join t_LoanInstallment (nolock) li on li.AccountID = l.AccountID and li.OurBranchID = l.OurBranchID and l.LoanSeries = li.LoanSeries where l.LoanStatusID NOT IN ('X') and ac.ProductID not in ('LNRP01', 'LSF') and li.InstallmentNo = '1' AND ac.ClientID = ?

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern
Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.value: select accountid AS accountID, format(TrxDate, 'dd MMMM yyyy') AS transactionDate, amount AS transactionAmount, '1' AS paymentTypeId, AccountID + '_' + CAST(LoanSeries as nvarchar(4)) + '_' + InstComponentTypeID AS note, 'dd MMMM yyyy' AS dateFormat, 'en' AS locale from t_loantrx (nolock) lt where IsReversed = 0 and isPosted = 1 and LoanStatusID = 'A' and accountid = ? order by TrxDate asc

config.comments: SELECT cl.ClientID AS id, SUBSTRING(cl.Name,0,CHARINDEX(' ',cl.Name)) AS firstname, SUBSTRING(cl.Name,CHARINDEX(' ',cl.Name),LEN(cl.Name)) AS lastname, cl.Mobile AS mobileNo, cl.ClientID AS externalId, 1 AS officeId, 1 AS legalFormId, 'false' AS isStaff, 'true' AS active, 'dd MMMM yyyy' AS dateFormat, 'en' AS locale, FORMAT(cl.OpenedDate, 'dd MMMM yyyy') AS activationDate, FORMAT(cl.CreatedOn, 'dd MMMM yyyy') AS submittedOnDate FROM t_Client cl WHERE cl.ClientStatusID = 'A';

entry.value: SELECT distinct (cl.ClientID) AS id, SUBSTRING(cl.Name,0,CHARINDEX(' ',cl.Name)) AS firstname, SUBSTRING(cl.Name,CHARINDEX(' ',cl.Name),LEN(cl.Name)) AS lastname, cl.Mobile AS mobileNo, cl.ClientID AS externalId, 1 AS officeId, 1 AS legalFormId, 'false' AS isStaff, 'true' AS active, 'dd MMMM yyyy' AS dateFormat, 'en' AS locale, FORMAT(cl.CreatedOn, 'dd MMMM yyyy') AS activationDate, FORMAT(cl.CreatedOn, 'dd MMMM yyyy') AS submittedOnDate FROM t_Loan (nolock) l left join t_AccountCustomer (nolock) ac on l.accountid = ac.accountid join t_ClientIndividual (nolock) ci on ci.ClientID = ac.ClientID join t_Client (nolock) cl on cl.ClientID = ci.ClientID WHERE cl.ClientStatusID = 'A' AND l.LoanStatusID NOT IN ('X')
